Thank you for your interest in EnterpriseSearch Sorting

Thank you for volunteering to help with EnterpriseSearch Sorting. Your registration information is being processed and an account is being created. You should receive another e-mail message with your user name, temporary password, and basic getting-started information within the next 2-3 days.

We encourage you to read the online sorting instructions prior to receiving your account. Being familiar with the project instructions will help you have a productive and satisfying experience as you participate in this exciting effort.

Sincerely,

The EnterpriseSearch Sorting Registration Team
